author: I. Olaizola
title: Los farmacéuticos de Baleares instan a vacunarse a los clientes que compran antigripales
text: Consciente de que la campaña de vacunación contra la gripe está naufragando (los últimos datos oficiales revelaban que tan solo se [había inmunizado una de cada cinco personas de la población diana ](https://www.diariodemallorca.es/mallorca/2023/12/19/fracasa-campana-gripe-baleares-5-96003775.html)llamada a hacerlo), la conselleria de Salud ha decidido recurrir a los farmacéuticos. «Nos agradaría contar con vuestro apoyo y colaboración para difundir la importancia de vacunarse de la gripe [antes de que lleguen los dos picos epidémicos, que en Balears suelen darse por Navidades y en el mes de febrero](https://www.diariodemallorca.es/mallorca/2023/12/28/incremento-infecciones-respiratorias-tensiona-servicios-96305943.html)», reza literalmente una circular enviada al Colegio de Farmacéuticos (COFIB) el 22 de diciembre y firmada por los directores generales de Salud Pública, Antònia Esteban, y el de Prestaciones, Farmacia y Consumo, Juan Simonet. «Conscientes de vuestro papel como agentes clave en la transmisión de información, solicitamos vuestro apoyo en la tarea de concienciar a la población sobre la necesidad de inmunizarse contra la gripe. (...). Consideramos que vuestra implicación puede ser de gran ayuda para mejorar las coberturas vacunales y, por tanto, la salud de la población», continúa la circular remitida a la institución colegial. [«Es fundamental resaltar que la vacunación contra la gripe ](https://www.diariodemallorca.es/mallorca/2023/10/11/vacunas-gripe-covid-mallorca-fechas-93217075.html)(...) está [abierta a toda la población balear](https://www.diariodemallorca.es/mallorca/2023/12/18/vacunar-gripe-poblacion-baleares-95986415.html). Independientemente de si forma parte o no de los grupos de riesgo establecidos en la primera fase de la campaña de vacunación, todos pueden vacunarse», prosigue la comunicación oficial. Una circular que destaca «la importancia de incidir en grupos específicos como los fumadores y r [ecordar a los padres la importancia de la vacunación de la gripe infantil ](https://www.diariodemallorca.es/mallorca/2023/11/03/arranca-campana-vacunacion-infantil-baleares-94157092.html)que, principalmente en los menores de cinco años, puede complicarse de manera grave. Es conveniente recordar que, en la actualidad, a los menores de entre 2 y 17 años la vacuna de la gripe se administra de manera intranasal». Por todos estos motivos, las citadas direcciones generales instan a las farmacias comunitarias a recordar a las personas que entren en sus establecimientos para adquirir antigripales que pueden pedir cita telefoneando a Infosalut Connecta (971 22 00 00) o «directamente a su centro de salud» (sic). Desde la Conselleria añadieron que se intentará vacunar de forma oportunista a todos los pacientes que tengan una consulta con su médico de cabecera. Consejos Con la bajada de temperaturas y el aumento de los encuentros sociales, debido a las fiestas navideñas, suben también los casos de virus respiratorios, como son la gripe o la covid-19. Por ello la conselleria de Salud, a través de la dirección general de Salud Pública, recuerda a la ciudadanía la necesidad de tomar una serie de medidas eficaces para preservar la salud individual y colectiva. Por ello, este departamento recuerda que: Las vacunas son seguras. Previenen las infecciones y protegen nuestro entorno. Seguid las recomendaciones de vacunación ante microorganismos respiratorios. Hay que cubrirse la nariz y la boca al toser o estornudar. Usad pañuelos desechables para contener las gotitas respiratorias o las secreciones y tiradlos después a la papelera. Lavaos las manos con agua y jabón o con un gel que contenga alcohol, de manera frecuente y especialmente si estáis resfriados. Usad mascarilla si tenéis síntomas respiratorios. Evitad ir al trabajo si tenéis síntomas de enfermedad, siempre que sea posible. Os recordamos que podéis pedir cita para la vacunación en Infosalud Connecta al teléfono 971 220000. Concluye la comunicación oficial difundida ayer.

author: HT Correspondent
title: Low visibility as fog envelopes Kashmir - Hindustan Times
text: Fog continued to envelope Kashmir for the fifth consecutive day on Friday, effecting the normal life in the Valley. The India Meteorological Department, however, has forecast improvement in visibility from Saturday (December 30) because of a feeble western weather system.Parts of the Valley, including summer capital Srinagar, were seen covered with fog in the morning, disrupting traffic movement and business activities.The MeT said that the weather would continue to be cloudy with dry with moderate to dense fog over plains of Kashmir and Jammu division.“There will be slight improvement in visibility during December 30 and 31 due to approaching feeble western disturbance,” said MeT’s Srinagar centre director Mukhtar Ahmad.He added that they expect light snowfall at isolated higher reaches on January 4.“Fog likely to continue till January 4 due to absence of any major wet spell. Overall, no significant weather activity till the January 4,” he added. Independent weather observer Faizan Arif posed on micr-blogging platform “X” that the approaching Western Disturbance was set to influence Jammu and Kashmir over Saturday and Sunday, but was unlikely to bring any precipitation.“Despite the chance of a slight improvement in foggy conditions over the next 48 hours, ...the forecast indicates that Jammu and Kashmir will continue to experience foggy weather, whether it’s shallow or dense, for the next seven days,” he said.Kashmir’s harshest winter period, “Chilla-i-Kalan”, began last week with the mercury dropping several notches below the freezing point at many places.While the day temperatures remain between 8°C to 12°C, the minimum night temperatures continued to remain below zero on the intervening night of Thursday and Friday in the valley.The southern Konibal area and Pahalgam tourist resort were the coldest at minus 6.5°C and minus 5.4°C, respectively. The ski resort of Gulmarg in the north recorded temperature of minus 2.5°C, the only place with temperature about 3.7 notches higher than the normal at this time.In Srinagar, the temperature was minus 3.3°C, about 1.2 notches below normal for the summer capital.The MeT update further added that the gateway to Kashmir in the south, Qazigund recorded a minimum of minus 4.2°C and the southern area of Kokernag observed a minimum of minus 2.6°C. In north Kashmir, Kupwara recorded a low of minus 4°C.Kashmir’s winter pans out in three stages, starting with the 40-day intense period from December 21, followed by 20 days of comparatively less intense chill (Chilla-i-Khurd), and final 10 days of mild cold (Chill-e-Bache).

author: sina.com.cn
title: 7300mAh超大蓝海电池来袭 四款超长续航手机推荐|电池|超长|vivo_新浪科技_新浪网
text:
在智能手机使用日益频繁的今天，电池续航成为了消费者选择手机时的重要考量因素。今天，我们就来为大家推荐四款拥有超大电池和长续航能力的手机——vivo Y300 Pro+、一加 Ace 5 Pro、REDMI Turbo 4、真我Neo7。
vivo Y300 Pro+：续航新标杆
vivo Y300 Pro+作为vivo Y系列的最新产品，以7300mAh超薄蓝海电池为核心卖点，重新定义了中端机型的续航天花板。这意味着，vivo Y300 Pro+在保持轻薄机身的同时，拥有了更为强劲的续航能力。
得益于超大的电池容量，vivo Y300 Pro+的续航相当持久，经历5小时的重度续航测试后还能剩余78%电量，对于普通用户来说可以不用考虑续航焦虑的问题。这里还有很贴心的一点，vivo Y300 Pro+在电量即将耗尽时会自动开启微电精灵模式，尽可能延长接听电话、查看信息的时长，这点值得点赞。
除了大容量的电池，vivo Y300 Pro+还支持90W FlashCharge超快闪充技术。
一加 Ace 5 Pro：旗舰级续航体验
一加 Ace 5 Pro内置了6100mAh的大容量电池，辅以10%的含硅量设计，使得电池厚度得以控制，机身厚度仅为8.14mm，重量也控制在200克出头。这样的设计，让用户在享受长续航的同时，也能拥有舒适的握持感。
在充电方面，一加 Ace 5 Pro支持100W快充技术，此外，一加 Ace 5 Pro还配备了旁路充电技术，游戏时只供电不充电，有效降低了边玩边充的发热问题。
REDMI Turbo 4：性能与续航并重
REDMI Turbo 4配备了6550mAh的强大电池，在性能配置方面，REDMI Turbo 4全球首发搭载联发科天玑8400-Ultra SoC处理器，性能强劲无比。此外，它还配备了6.67英寸的OLED直屏和专业的影像系统，为用户提供了全面的使用体验。
真我Neo7：电竞级续航怪兽
真我Neo7配备了7000mAh的超大容量泰坦电池，是目前市场上电池容量最大的直板手机之一。在性能配置方面，真我Neo7搭载了天玑9300+处理器，安兔兔跑分接近221万，运行大型游戏和多任务处理时都表现得非常流畅和稳定。
总结
在以上四款机型中，vivo Y300 Pro+以7300mAh超薄蓝海电池和90W快充技术脱颖而出，成为了超大电池长续航手机的佼佼者。无论是从电池容量、充电速度还是电池寿命方面来看，vivo Y300 Pro+都表现出了卓越的性能。如果你是一位对续航有极高要求的用户，那么vivo Y300 Pro+绝对是你的不二之选。

author: Johan Moison
title: Sauvé d'une crise cardiaque grâce à une incroyable chaine de secours - France Bleu
text: Sauvé d'une crise cardiaque grâce à une incroyable chaine de secours Ce jeudi 14 mars, Charles Bordais a rencontré ses sauveurs à l'hôpital Yves Le Foll de Saint-Brieuc. Victime d'un infarctus mi-janvier, ce quadragénaire a pu être sauvé grâce l'intervention d'une incroyable chaine de secours. Le 15 janvier 2024, Charles Bordais, 44 ans, vient d'aller chercher sa fille Soane, 8 ans, à l'école. "Je fais prendre le gouter à ma fille et je sens cette douleur dans le bras, l'épaule, des fourmis". Charles est victime d'une crise cardiaque. "Je prends le téléphone fixe de la maison et je compose le 115. J'essaie de donner mon adresse et je fais signe à Soane de prendre le relais. La suite, je ne m'en souviens pas". L'émouvante conversation entre la fille de la victime et les secours Soane saisit le téléphone. Et commence à échanger avec Sophie Doledec, l'assistante de régulation médicale, qui prend en charge l'appel depuis les Urgences l'hôpital Yves Le Foll à Saint-Brieuc. Elle témoigne ici au micro de France bleu Armorique. Un sauveteur volontaire de SauvLife dans le secteur Soane pose le combiné sur la bouche de son papa pour savoir s'il respire. Elle demande à son papa de se battre. Au même moment, à 600 mètres de là, Philippe Le Du reçoit un SMS sur son portable. Cet habitant de Plouhran est inscrit sur SauvLife, une application qui rassemble des sauveteurs volontaires, mobilisables par les secours en cas d'arrêts cardiaques, près de chez eux. "J'étais sur place en deux, trois minutes, je suis arrivé juste après les gendarmes", se souvient Philippe qui est également pompier volontaire. "Monsieur Bordais est là, en arrêt, au sol. On se relaie au massage". Une équipe du SMUR est en route. Chaque minute compte. "Le fait d'intervenir rapidement permet aux pompiers puis à l'équipe médicale d'apporter des secours qui donnent plus de chance au patient", souligne Philippe. Deux mois après son infarctus, Charles a rencontré tous ses sauveurs ce jeudi 14 mars à l'hôpital de Saint-Brieuc et en a profité pour leur offrir des chocolats. Cette histoire est "l'occasion de rappeler que les bons réflexes et la formation des citoyens aux premiers secours font partie intégrante des secours d'urgences", insiste la direction de l'hôpital. Ma France : Améliorer le logement des Français Quelles sont vos solutions pour aider les Français à bien se loger ? En partenariat avec [Make.org](https://make.org/FR), France Bleu mène une consultation citoyenne à laquelle vous pouvez participer ci-dessous. Côtes-d'Armor : l'info en continu Côtes-d'Armor : les plus consultés La vidéo impressionnante du passage de deux hélicoptères de l'armée sous le viaduc à Saint-Brieuc [France Bleu Armorique](/armorique) Passage en rase-motte sous le viaduc de Saint-Brieuc : les deux hélicoptères de combat participaient à un exercice [France Bleu Armorique](/armorique) Les tutos de ce prof d'anglais installé en Bretagne cartonnent sur YouTube [France Bleu Armorique](/armorique)

author: NewsGPT
title: Five transformative technologies of 2023
text:
2023 has been marked by unprecedented technological advancements that have reshaped industries and daily life.
From artificial intelligence (AI) to biotechnology, here are the top five technologies that have revolutionised the landscape:
1. NewsGPT: Redefining news delivery with AI
At the forefront of the technological revolution is NewsGPT, a groundbreaking AI-driven platform that has reimagined how we consume news. NewsGPT, the world’s first 24/7 news channel powered entirely by AI, has transformed news reporting by eliminating bias and delivering information with unparalleled speed and accuracy. This innovative technology ensures that AI creates, curates, and presents news, from generating stories to producing news anchors. The advent of NewsGPT marks a significant leap toward unbiased, efficient news dissemination.
2. Quantum computing: Unleashing unprecedented processing power
In 2023, quantum computing took a giant leap forward, promising unparalleled processing power that can revolutionise complex problem-solving. Quantum computers leverage the principles of quantum mechanics to perform computations at speeds unimaginable with traditional computers. This technology can potentially transform industries such as cryptography, materials science, and AI, opening up new frontiers in scientific research and technological innovation.
3. 5G technology: Connecting the world at unprecedented speeds
The widespread adoption of 5G technology has ushered in a new era of connectivity. With faster data speeds, lower latency, and increased capacity, 5G enables a range of applications, from augmented reality to the Internet of Things (IoT). This technology has not only enhanced mobile communications but has also laid the foundation for the development of smart cities and advanced industrial automation.
Read:
What is 5G? An electrical engineer explains
You’ve heard of 5G. Now meet Wi-Fi 6
4. Biotechnology advancements: Personalising healthcare
In 2023, biotechnology made remarkable strides in personalising healthcare solutions. Integrating AI with genomics has allowed for more precise diagnoses and personalised treatment plans. CRISPR technology continues to evolve, offering unprecedented capabilities for gene editing and potential cures for genetic diseases. Biotechnological innovations are reshaping the landscape of medicine, promising more effective and tailored healthcare solutions.
Read: Gene-edited tomatoes: scientists use CRISPR to supply ‘sunshine vitamin
5. Augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR): Transforming user experiences
The immersive experiences offered by AR and VR technologies reached new heights in 2023. From virtual meetings to AR gaming, these technologies are transforming the way we interact with digital content. In the business sector, AR is enhancing employee training and improving efficiency, while VR is finding applications in fields like education and healthcare.
Listen/read: The impact of wireless technology today
The technological landscape of 2023 is characterised by innovation, with each advancement contributing to transforming industries and daily life. NewsGPT, quantum computing, 5G technology, biotechnology, and AR/VR are among the standout technologies that have left an indelible mark on the year, heralding a future defined by unprecedented possibilities and opportunities for progress.

author: @WGEM
title: Great River Honor Flight Marks 15 Years of Honoring Veterans with 68 Missions and Counting
text: Great River Honor Flight marks 15 years of honoring veterans with 68 missions and counting QUINCY (WGEM) - In a remarkable milestone, the Great River Honor Flight is celebrating its 15th year of operation, having successfully completed 68 missions to date. Since Veterans Day in 2009, this local Honor Flight hub has been dedicated to providing free trips to Washington, D.C. for veterans from across Illinois, Missouri and Iowa. Carlos Fernandez, Chairman of the Great River Honor Flight Board, expressed gratitude for the continuous support from the public, emphasizing that the program’s longevity is a testament to the unwavering support it has received. “The reason it’s lasted 15 years is because the public has been very supportive of that,” Fernandez said. The program has made a significant impact by honoring nearly 2,200 veterans over the past 14 years. The breakdown includes 430 WWII veterans, 525 Korean War veterans, 1,098 Vietnam veterans, and 61 Armed Forces veterans. Veterans from 69 counties across Illinois, Missouri, and Iowa have been recognized, with some expressing that it’s the first genuine “thank you” they’ve received. Marine Vietnam Veteran Leslie Lair shared his perspective on the emotional experience. “When you go out as a veteran, it’s a whole new ballgame,” Lair said. “It’s something you don’t realize the emotions are there until you do it with other veterans.” The Great River Honor Flight has served as a unique opportunity for veterans to receive the appreciation they may not have felt upon returning home. “Many of them don’t think they deserve to go on an Honor Flight, which is foolish. They served their country, and that’s what we are here to honor,” Fernandez said. Looking ahead to 2024, the Great River Honor Flight is gearing up for six missions, continuing its tradition of honoring and celebrating the heroes who have served. The success of the program is not only measured in sentiment, but also in numbers. Over the past 14 years, the Great River Honor Flight has covered 120,904 air miles, visited 544 memorials, chartered 140 buses, served 11,694 meals, and distributed over 30,000 bottles of water. Additionally, more than 15,000 letters were handed out during mail calls. Vice-chair Sharon Lake emphasized that the mission is far from over. “Our number one goal is to ensure that all local veterans are aware of this opportunity and sign up for a future flight,” Lake said. Veterans who have served prior to July 1, 1985, are encouraged to visit the Great River Honor Flight [website](https://www.greatriverhonorflight.com/) and fill out an application to be added to the list for upcoming trips. Copyright 2023 WGEM. All rights reserved.

author: Loren Albano
title: 13 Best 8GB DDR4 RAM For 2023 | Robots.net
text: Introducing the 13 Best 8GB DDR4 RAM For 2023. When it comes to optimizing the performance of your computer, having reliable and efficient RAM plays a crucial role. With the rapidly evolving technology landscape, it's essential to stay ahead with the latest DDR4 RAM options that offer exceptional speed and reliability. In this article, we will dive into the 13 top choices for 8GB [DDR4 RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-ddr4-ram/), curated specifically for the demands of 2023. Whether you are a gamer, a professional, or an avid multitasker, these options will undoubtedly enhance your computing experience. Overall Score: 9/10 Upgrade your laptop's performance with the Crucial RAM 8GB DDR4 3200MHz CL22 Laptop Memory. This memory module allows you to improve your system's responsiveness and multitask with ease. With the option to downclock to 2933MHz or 2666MHz, it offers compatibility assurance for systems with lower specifications. Enhance your laptop’s performance and enjoy a smoother computing experience with this reliable and stylish memory kit from PNY. 8GB DDR4 RAM Buyer's Guide Key Considerations When searching for the perfect 8GB DDR4 RAM for your needs, keep the following factors in mind: - Compatibility: Ensure that the RAM is compatible with your motherboard and other system components. - Frequency: Higher frequencies generally offer better performance, so consider your specific requirements. - Latency: Lower latency RAM provides quicker data access, but the difference is often minor. - CAS Latency: CL measures the time it takes to access data, so a lower CL is preferable. - Voltage: Verify the RAM's voltage requirements to avoid any potential compatibility issues. - Brand: Established and reputable brands tend to offer higher quality and better support. - Cooling: Consider RAM modules with heat spreaders for enhanced heat dissipation. - Warranty: Check the warranty offered to ensure you're protected against any manufacturing defects. Advantages of 8GB DDR4 RAM - Sufficient Capacity: [8GB RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-8gb-of-ram/)is suitable for everyday tasks, such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia consumption. - Good Gaming Potential: 8GB RAM is sufficient for many modern games, providing a smooth gaming experience with moderate settings. - Cost-Effective: 8GB RAM offers a good balance between performance and affordability, making it a popular choice for budget-conscious buyers. - Upgrade Potential: If your motherboard supports higher capacities, starting with 8GB RAM allows for easy future upgrades. How Much RAM Do You Need? The amount of RAM you require depends on your specific use case. Consider the following: - For everyday use, 8GB RAM is generally enough for smooth multitasking and basic applications. - Gamers should aim for at least [16GB RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-16gb-ram/)to handle modern games and ensure optimal performance. - Content creators, video editors, and graphic designers may benefit from 32GB or more RAM for handling resource-intensive tasks. Frequently Asked Questions about 13 Best 8GB DDR4 RAM For 2023 No, DDR3 and DDR4 RAM are not cross-compatible due to differences in physical design and electrical requirements. Ensure your motherboard supports DDR4 before purchasing. The difference lies in the frequency, meaning the speed at which data is transferred. The 8GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM has a higher maximum transfer rate, resulting in faster performance than the 8GB DDR4 2133MHz RAM. While it’s technically possible, it’s generally not recommended. Mixing RAM modules from different brands and capacities may cause compatibility issues and potentially impact system stability. [DDR3 RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-does-ddr3-ram-mean/)? No, laptops have specific memory slot designs that are meant to accommodate either DDR3 or DDR4 RAM. Verify your laptop’s specifications and use the appropriate RAM type. Yes, most manufacturers consider overclocking as unauthorized usage, and it may void the warranty. Always check the manufacturer’s guidelines before attempting any overclocking.
